name: Disarray
description:
[Controller Recommended]

Put your dodging skills to the test and see how many points you can rake up before your inevitable demise.
Collect objectives to score points. The value of an decays over time, so get it as fast as you can. For each objective you collect, an enemy will spawn bouncing around the map.

Donations are always appreciated! And thanks for checking out Disarray!

Credits

- Art by Kate Selby-Bennetts
--- Check out their website here!

- Effects and Programming by Gordon Fong
--- Check out their website here!

- Collect the OBJECTIVES as quickly as you can!
- Dodge the ENEMIES as they ricochet around the map!
- Survive as long as you can!

CONTROLS
Use [W], [A], [S], [D] or [ARROW KEYS] to move via keyboard.
Use [LEFT THUMBSTICK] to move via Xbox 360 Controller.
